resources.description:
Income Deprivation measures the proportion of the population experiencing deprivation relating to low income. The definition of low income used includes both those people that are out-of-work, and those that are in work but who have low earnings (and who satisfy the respective means tests).
It is one of a series of measures under the IMD (Index of Multiple Deprivation).
Sourced from DCLG https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/english-indices-of-deprivation-2015
resources.name: Income Deprivation in Herefordshire 2007 - 2013. The proportion of the population experiencing deprivation relating to low income

organization.description:
This is the community datastore for Herefordshire. [Here is a post about what the datastore is and why you should care](http://h-map.org.uk/2016/05/06/what-is-the-herefordshire-datastore-and-why-should/).


Part of the [Brightspace Foundation Route Map project](http://h-map.org.uk/).

We blog over at the [Route Map blog](http://h-map.org.uk/category/all-posts/).

If you'd like to add data here, you'll need a datahub.io account. Then [contact the RouteMap project](http://h-map.org.uk/contact-us/).
organization.title: Herefordshire
organization.name: hdata

name: income-deprivation-in-herefordshire-2007-2013
notes:
This data is sourced from the Index of Multiple Deprivation (department of Communities and Local Government).
https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/english-indices-of-deprivation-2015.
title: Income deprivation in Herefordshire 2007 - 2013
